While on a short road trip for work, I stopped here because it had 5 stars, and great comments. After entering the store, I realized that the great comments were true. The prices were great, and had a variety of  items.
David has a great personality, is knowledgable about coins, bullion, and the coin collecting community in general. I will be back anytime that I am in the area.

text: Went here with my sister to get a coin collection appraisal and just to learn some knowledge. The staff was very helpful and after going to more than one coin shop found the prices to sell gold and silver here to be higher than other places in town. The owner was very patient with us and answered any and all of my questions to the best of his knowledge and even text and called other dealers to get answers and 2nd opinions on some of my more rare coins to make me feel better. When I do decide to sell our collection I will be calling here to give them the first crack at buying everything. I highly recommend.

We are always open and honest with how we price coins that people bring to us for us to buy. Please stop by soon so we can try to correct this situation.

text:
I was a customer of Walter Bartee for many years and was always impressed about his honest, fair
and friendly approach to doing business. After Walt's passing, the business was taken over by his grandson, Jared Bentley, who inherited those traits from Walt. If you want a honest deal for either buying or selling, there is no one better than Jared Bentley. Give him a chance to work your deal, you won't be disappointed.

name: Will Smith
text: Very very impressed and happy with the service here! Very fair on what he offered me for my gold and silver. After being promised a certain amount over the phone by CROOKED "Cash Gold Buyers" and after driving an hour to deal with them, they then offered $2700 less on a $22000 deal, based the same approximate market value as was when we spoke. What they offered was much less than most other dealer's spot. The guy that runs the business had an excuse of that he and his partner don't agree at times and that HE is the buyer. Un-excusable! Went to Bartee afterwards and received from them what the crooks had originally quoted. He even told me to keep my platinum for now because it it way too low and will go back up. Will not deal with anyone else but Bartee from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for the review and it was a pleasure doing business with you sir!

resp.text: Unfortunately,this happens from time to time.I appraise countless coins from the public each year.I will always try and be respectful and charge no fee for most evaluations.In some incidences, coins are worth less than people think.In this case the person had the same type coin that I had in the case,but a different date,not realizing the one I had in the display case was a much rarer date.There are so many factors that determine a coins value...condition,date and mint marks, among many other factors.

text: I'm giving 5 stars on customer service only.  Staff gets 5 stars. All very friendly.  But I give 1 star on the fact of not being fair on cash purchases of items. I had some extra items I was going to sell you that I didn't need. You offered 8% of the purchase value of these items. I understand as a business owner. That we must all make a profit. I was willing to part at a fair price.. But the offer you gave was very insulting. I hope you all the best in business and will miss visiting your staff. Timothy Wyant Googles Number 1 review Guide and travel guide...

resp.text: Hey Timothy Thank you for your review.  We appreciate you bringing in your stuff and giving us a opportunity to purchase it.  We realize that we can't make everybody happy with our offers.  We are never trying to insult with our offers.  Your items no matter how new you say it is, they are second hand therefore we can't pay you what you paid the store to get it.

resp.text: Hello Tonya, I am very sorry to hear about your experience at our store.  We pride ourselves on customer service, We have always greeted everyone that comes in with courtesy and respect. name: Wargasm644
text: Went in to look for a guitar. Found a really nice one hanging on the wall. I know what they sell for at music stores and eBay. An employee named Alex asked me if I’d like to plug it in and check it out? A sure sign that the employees are confident in what they sell. After checking it out for fret wear and any obvious flaws, I wanted it. It was very nice and played fantastic! The price was reasonable too. Considering they have overhead and payroll to contend with the likes of eBay and Amazon. They landed me a VERY competitive price and I walked out with a super nice guitar! Alex and the entire staff were class acts and treated me like they really wanted my business. Something you don’t see much of anymore in this day and age. I know where I’m going when I need another guitar!  I would recommend anyone shopping pawn businesses and such to  check these guys out first! A++

The prices are super competitive if not the lowest around. I put a lot of time and research in before I made my purchase and Family Jewelry  & Loan is the real deal!

PART 2

Wouldn't let me do another review so here's part 2. Another visit another fantastic experience! Staff is knowledgeable and friendly! David & family have so many choices and options I feel like a kid in a candy store! I feel guilty taking up so much of their time, but not once have I felt rushed or heard that dreaded deep breath of hurry up and get out like you get other places. In you are looking for jewelry,  computers, tools, games, movies, guns shop here first!

name: Ralph Cantrell
text:
This might be the best pawn shop in town. The atmosphere was several degrees better than your average pawn shop - very clean and well lit, customer friendly, and the folks running the place were very conscientious and genuinely nice. We actually felt welcomed and appreciated for just stopping by to browse. Even my wife and teenager really liked the place and they are both easily "sketched-out" by any kind of second hand store.

I was really impressed with all the good stuff for sale. All of it was very nicely displayed too. There were guns of all kinds and other hunting equipment, tools, musical instruments, high-end sunglasses, games, sports equipment, rods and reels, portable air conditioners, TVs and other electronics - you name it - and LOTS of top quality jewelry. (I'm pretty sure wifey plans to sneak back over there without me :-0 )

The prices seem fair and are clearly marked, but don't be afraid to ask for an even better deal. I was able to negotiate a great price on a particular item I had been needing for a long time but could never bring myself to purchase. Now I am glad I waited.

This place is a 5-star business for sure.

Thanks, Family Jewelry and Loan!!

resp.text: Ralph Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.  We work really hard on keeping a clean, organized store.  We understand that a comfortable environment is really important now a days to make everyone feel welcome, and we strive to do this on a daily basis.  We really appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.

name: Todd Zelenka (zeltod)
text:
I stopped in the store at a recommendation from a friend at church.  I was looking for a ring for my wife to celebrate our 10 years together.  I have to say that the ring I found was an EXCELLENT deal - I am not a jewelry expert and was a little uneasy about buying jewelry from a pawn shop.  I was told that the shop would stand behind the ring and wrote the details about the ring on my receipt that they would guarantee.

The next day I went to a local jewelry store to see what kind of deal I got.  Man was I surprised - I not only got a confirmation of the details of the ring were 100% correct - I was told that the ring was worth 5 times what I paid for it......I couldn't have been happier.

To know that I got a great deal on a great piece of jewelry alone would bring me back to this store.  Then add the friendly, customer centered, genuine service I received from the staff and  I will be a customer for a long time.  In fact, I came back a couple weeks later and bought a cool watch.

Make this your first or last stop and you will be glad you did.

resp.text: Thank you Todd we appreciate your business and are glad your happy with your purchase.  We pride ourselves on having the BEST jewelry prices in town.
